CHADS2_TXT: Determines CHADS² Score based on user input variables
HAS_BLED_TXT: Determines HAS-BLED Score based on user input variables
PROBABILIDADE_HTA_TXT: Allows calculation of scores to predict 1-, 2-, and 4-year risk for new-onset hypertension
CHA2DS2_VASC_TXT: Determines CHA²DS²-VASc Score based on user input variables
ESCOLHA_ACO_TXT: Suggests oral prescription medication based on user input variables
ANTHROPOMETRY_TXT: Allows calculation of Body Mass Index, Ponderal Index and Body Surface Metrics (Mosteller and Haycock).
GLOMERULAR_FILTRATION_RATE_TXT: Determines MDRD (Modification of Diet for Renal Disease Study Equation) and CKD-EPI (Chronical Kidney Disease - Epidemiologique Study) Scores.
